name: ACH_IS_LIFE_ALWAYS_THIS_HARD
description: Died in the first fight.

name: ACH_KILLED_MORE_PEOPLE_THAN_MALARIA
description: Kill a hundred people in the course of one game.

name: ACH_KILLER_OF_MEN
description: Fight your way out of Teron, leaving nothing but corpses behind.

name: ACH_TERMINATOR
description: Deal with the raiders and the Aurelian outpost by killing everyone. Not very subtle, but extremely effective.

name: ACH_DEMONBANE
description: Enter a wizard's tower and slay the demon that dwells within it, cleansing the tower from evil.

name: ACH_STONECOLD_KILLER
description: Kill the Guildmaster of the Assassins Guild and Lord Gaelius during an audience at his own palace.

name: ACH_300
description: Defeat the Ordu army at a narrow mountain pass and live to tell the tale.

name: ACH_ORDU_CHAMPION
description: Kill Belgutai to impress the Ordu with your martial prowess.

name: ACH_KINGSLAYER
description: Provoke Lord Antidas to attack the Imperial Guards delegation and kill him.

name: ACH_NAMELESS_ONE
description: Die a hundred times and live again.

name: ACH_GRIM_REAPER
description: Kill 200 people in the course of one game.

name: ACH_ARENA_CHAMPION
description: Fight your way to the top and become the new Champion of the Arena.

name: ACH_MERCENARY
description: Complete the first quest as a mercenary.

name: ACH_THIEF
description: Complete the first quest as a thief.

name: ACH_ASSASSIN
description: Complete the first quest as an assassin.

name: ACH_LOREMASTER
description: Complete the first quest as a loremaster.

name: ACH_DRIFTER
description: Complete the first quest as a drifter.

name: ACH_GRIFTER
description: You completed the first quest as a grifter.

name: ACH_MERCHANT
description: Complete the first quest as a merchant.

name: ACH_PRAETOR
description: Complete the first quest as a praetor.

name: ACH_TERON_AG
description: Complete the Assassins Guild's questline in Teron.

name: ACH_TERON_IG
description: Complete the Imperial Guards' questline in Teron.

name: ACH_TERON_TG
description: Complete the Thieves Guild's questline in Teron.

name: ACH_TERON_MG
description: Complete the Merchants Guild's questline in Teron.

name: ACH_TERON_HD
description: Complete the Praetor's questline in Teron.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_AG_1
description: Complete the Assassins Guild's questline in Maadoran, serving Lord Gaelius and killing his enemies.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_IG
description: Complete the Imperial Guards' questline in Maadoran.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_AG_2
description: Complete the Assassins Guild's questline in Maadoran, double-crossing your Guildmaster.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_TG
description: Complete the Thieves Guild's questline in Maadoran.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_MG
description: Complete the Merchants Guild's questline in Maadoran.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_HD
description: Complete the Praetor of House Daratan's questline in Maadoran.

name: ACH_MAADORAN_HA
displayName: Rough Men Standing Ready To Do Violence
description: Complete the Praetor of House Aurelian's questline in Maadoran.

name: ACH_LIEGEMAN_HD
description: Pledge your fealty to House Daratan, swearing to serve Lord Antidas.

name: ACH_LIEGEMAN_HA
description: Pledge your fealty to House Aurelian, swearing to serve Lord Gaelius.

name: ACH_LEGIONARY
description: Join the Imperial Guards to be All You Can Be.

name: ACH_CENTURION
description: Get promoted to the rank of Centurion.

name: ACH_LEGATUS
description: Get promoted to the rank of Legatus.

name: ACH_MAADORAN
description: Visit Maadoran - the largest city in the known world.

name: ACH_ORDU
description: Visit an Ordu camp beyond the mountains.

name: ACH_PASS
description: Visit Harran's Pass.

name: ACH_TOWER
description: Explore the Tower of Zamedi.

name: ACH_ABYSS
description: Explore the very heart of the Abyss.

name: ACH_DESTROYED_MAADORAN
description: "And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger... And you will know I am the Lord when I lay My vengeance upon you."

name: ACH_TRAITOR
description: You have a dangerous habit of betraying your masters.

name: ACH_HELMET_KEPT
description: Recover Darius' helmet but keep such a valuable relic for yourself.

name: ACH_EXPLOSION_EXPERT
description: Use an improvised explosive device to ambush the shipment and steal the gold.

name: ACH_SILVER_TONGUED
description: Fast-talk your way out of Teron, getting past every obstacle standing between you and the open road.

name: ACH_DIPLOMAT
description: Broker an alliance between House Daratan and the Imperial Guards.

name: ACH_KINGMAKER
description: Broker an alliance between House Daratan and the Imperial Guards, and convince Commander Carrinas to proclaim Antidas an Emperor.

name: ACH_MAGISTRATE
description: Outmaneuver your opponents and make Strabos the new magistratus of Maadoran.

name: ACH_HEALING_MACHINE
description: Take a ride in an ancient healing machine.

name: ACH_PEACEMAKER
description: Convince Belgutai to join Khan Thorgul and unite the Ordu tribe.

name: ACH_PERSUASIVE
description: Convince Lord Antidas to have Commander Carrinas killed without producing any proof.

name: ACH_INTERROGATOR
description: Have a heart to heart conversation with loremaster Sohrab and make him tell you everything he knows.

name: ACH_INFILTRATOR
description: Infiltrate House Daratan's compound and discuss employment opportunities with Lord Antidas.

name: ACH_MANIPULATOR
description: Talk the raiders into attacking the Aurelian outpost for you to kill two birds with one stone.

name: ACH_COLLECTOR
description: Acquire five different relics of the past, without having any idea what most of them are for.

name: ACH_ANTIQUE_EXPERT
description: Acquire ten different artefacts to start a collection.

name: ACH_MAGUS
description: Acquire powerful artefacts and learn how to use them.

name: ACH_CHOSEN_ONE
description: Convince a preacher from Ganezzar that you're the Chosen One, sent by the gods to lead mankind out of darkness.

name: ACH_MAGNETISM
description: Convince Centurion Flavius to introduce you to Lord Antidas.

name: ACH_GODLSAYER
description: Put a 'god' out of its misery, releasing it from the horror of its existence and ending the magic that haunted the Abyss for centuries.

name: ACH_DEAL_DEVIL
description: Make a deal with Legatus Carbo, promising him a worthy enemy and a war he's always dreamt of.

name: ACH_MILITIA_SPONSOR
description: Make a generous contribution to Regulus' campaign, funding a new militia to keep the city 'safe'.

name: ACH_TRAINED
description: Receive training from five different people in the course of one game.

name: ACH_WISDOM
description: Visit the Library of Saross.

name: ACH_WITNESS
description: Discover and read the ancient tablets - the warning of the Magi.

name: ACH_ARCH
description: Visit an ancient arch - a site of many miracles.

name: ACH_FRIENDS
description: Make new friends and learn how to influence people.

name: ACH_MONASTERY
description: Visit a monastery up in the mountains.

name: ACH_LICH
description: Acquire a rare extract of Amaranthus, use to make an elixir and drink it.

name: ACH_RIGHT_THING
description: Do the right thing. You'll know what it is.

name: ACH_INFERIAE
description: Visit Inferiae.

name: ACH_FIXIT
description: Fix the machines in the buried tower.

name: ACH_SKY_CITY
description: Hey, did you see that?

name: ACH_COMPUTER
description: Learn how to use the ancient consoles.

name: ACH_AUGMENTED
description: Improve your eyesight with a fashionable mechanical eye.

name: ACH_EXPLORER
description: Find a way into Maadoran's sewers.

name: ACH_HANGAR
description: Discover a long forgotten underground hangar.

name: ACH_FLY
description: Take the flying fortress for a spin.

name: ACH_ALK
description: Visit the ruins of Al-Akia.

name: ACH_GNZ
description: Visit Ganezzar.

name: ACH_POWER_ARMOR
description: Acquire Power Armor and fully charge it.

name: ACH_BREACH
description: Charge into the breach during the siege of Ganezzar.

name: ACH_FAELAN
description: Kill Faelan the Thrice Blessed.

name: ACH_HECTOR
description: Help Hector achieve his goals.

name: ACH_DARGANUS
description: Help Lord Darganus keep the rabble at bay.

name: ACH_TEMPLARS
description: Complete the Imperial Guards' questline in Ganezzar, siding with House Crassus.

name: ACH_IMPERIAL_ARMY
description: Complete the Imperial Guards' questline in Ganezzar, siding with House Aurelian.

name: ACH_FIRST_SWORD
description: Complete the Imperial Guards' questline in Ganezzar with the help of Commander Carrinas.

name: ACH_OPIUM
description: Complete the Merchants Guild's questline in Ganezzar, embracing Meru's Creed.

name: ACH_CORPORATE
description: Complete the Merchants Guild's questline in Ganezzar as per Strabos' orders.

name: ACH_LORD_LOWTOWN
description: Complete the Thieves Guild's questline in Ganezzar, siding with Glabrio.

name: ACH_AGGRESSIVE_NEG
description: Complete the Thieves Guild's questline in Ganezzar, double-crossing Glabrio.

name: ACH_INQUISITOR
description: Complete the Assassins Guild's questline in Ganezzar, siding with Varro.

name: ACH_GUILDSMAN
description: Complete the Assassins' Guild's questline in Ganezzar, staying true to the guild.

name: ACH_ENEMY
description: Complete the Praetor of House Daratan's questline in Ganezzar.

name: ACH_DELENDA
description: Complete the Praetor of House Aurelian's questline in Ganezzar.

name: ACH_GODS_AMONG
displayName: The Gods Shalt Walk Among Us
description: Complete the Praetor of House Crassus' questline in Ganezzar.

name: ACH_HELLGATE
description: Visit Hellgate and live to tell the tale.

name: ACH_DEAD_RIVER
description: Visit Dead River settlement.

name: ACH_ALK_DESTROYED
description: Destroy Al-Akia.

name: ACH_ONE_GOD
description: Ascend.

name: ACH_NUKE
description: You know what you have to do.

name: ACH_BALZAAR
description: Bring God's Kingdom to Earth.

name: ACH_AGATHOTH
description: Bring a new world order.

name: ACH_GODLESS
description: Kill Agathoth to protect mankind.

name: ACH_SLEEPING
description: Let sleeping dogs lie.

name: ACH_BURN
description: Some Men Just Want to Watch the World Burn.
